channel.title: Save Files Location
channel.description:
Hi, I've recently met with this game, it's obviously great and enjoyable. Thanks and congratulations for everyone in Black Mesa team.
I just need a help about personal configurations and achievements locations. I finished the game and unlocked every achievements. But I must format my PC asap and I don't want to lose my unlocked achievements.
I know where are the save files but I'm not sure how to backup my achievement process. Please help.
Thanks

item.title: Save Files Location
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
probably in user.cfg or another file in cfg folder

Read full topic

item.title: Save Files Location
item.dc:creator: tez
item.description:
Thanks, code works. But anyway I just wonder, which file has that data?

Read full topic

item.title: Save Files Location
item.dc:creator: tez
item.description:
Thank you, it was really simple and helpful info for me.

Do you also know which files keep unlock progress of “New Game” levels?

Read full topic

item.title: Save Files Location
item.dc:creator: Mr_GameCrazy
item.description:
This should help you.

Cpl.1nsane:

If memory serves me correctly the game generates a txt file called ‘gamestate.txt’ in the root folder \SourceMods\BMS\ that contains the achievement info.

Read full topic
